TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content: I suggest you wait up to 3 weeks. I will come, it just takes ages.
Just so everyone knows, the email arrives at the email linked to your PAYPAL account, not your forums account.
Paid, got conformation payment, paypal said it completed and that you would email me again, you never did. Sad face. :-*

I have still yet to receive my pre-order email and I've paid on the 13th of August

Cheers

Hi,

I paid $10 on the 18th of August. Got Paypal confirmation, and my order is visible in the KSP store, but I have yet to receive a pre-order confirmation email from Squad.

Eagerly awaiting future versions of KSP,

Thanks
I haven't gotten my confirmation from KSP. Ordered August 12th with receipt if you need it.

Tank you,just got my email today A little bit late ;P, but no big deal. Hope the $10 helps you out!

Dear ******* *****,

Thank you for pre-ordering Kerbal Space Program. Your forum's username and password will be stored for all future releases. Please keep this email as reference.

Happy launching!!

So far the only email I have received was the Paypal payment confirmation... nothing from KSP/Squad. I do not have a Paypal account, and used the one-time payment system set up through the donation link to make my contribution on August 30.
i prepaid aug 19, have only paypal confirmation

Hello, LcNessie here.

I also ordered 1 dollar followed by 9 dollars on August 12th, about 10:30 GMT.

I did receive a confirmation from KSP that I donated the money and that I would get a confirmation within 24 hours, but nothing since. I also kept an eye on my spam-box, but I may have missed it.

Kind regards, Mathijs

Just an update - still no confirmation email from the $15 USD donation on Aug 15th.

Paypal shows it going through.
Dont know if it will affect anything, I use a different email for paypal than I do for the forums - I did get the mail on my other account though
Got the standard receipt from Paypal and the notice about receiving confirmation in the next 24 hours, but I pre-ordered on the 3rd of September.

Never received confirmation.

Paypall: [email protected]

e: Got it.

Hello. I preordered on the 17th of August, donating $7 (shame on me, I know, but low income and high expenditures ). I recieved receipt from PayPal on my yahoo mail account, but no confirmation (not in my spam box or the trash), and I am using the same email address on my account here.

EDIT: Received the confirmation email on 3:33AM September 13, 2011. Thank you.

Yet another who's only received the paypal receipt and the 'You'll get a confirmation email in 24 hours' email, which I got on the 4th of September.

Not too worried, the fun I've had with KSP is probably worth what I donated

We apologize to all those who have not received the confirmation email.

While we recieve a notification in this thread, we work as fast as we can to send that email, so everyone has it. But it is worth reminding you to check your spam folder or if you wrote an email address different from the one related to your forum account, maybe the email is over there.

Cheers.

Is there any other way to donate/pre order?

To me PayPal is teh debbil and I really hate using it.

I have also only received the paypal receipt and the 'You'll get a confirmation email in 24 hours' email,checked spam folder...nothing. I forked over 10 bucks 'cause I likes dis game!

-found it! Thank You!

I have only gotten the 1st email as well. I got it on August 13. The 72 hour email either never showed up or got deleted as spam. I didn't read the first one very carefully, so I wasn't looking for the second one. It's a good thing I saw this thread.
It took about two weeks, but I have now received my pre-order confirmation email. 8)
I got both emails, but the Mac version is not listed in the preorder download links.

I thought I'd received my confirmation, but people keep talking about 'preorder download links' and I don't see any of those in the e-mail I received. I'm confused!

Scratch that, I checked back and am now unconfused. I did receive the confirmation and download links!
All good! Got the email a few days ago. Was somewhat delayed and dumped into spam, but I now have it! <Seagull sees paper and munches it> Oh bugger!

I donated 2 times with a total of $10,- received the email saying i will receive a pre-order confirmation, but never received this. Waiting a few weeks for the email now and checked spam folder / email on daily base.
